ventures.name: SymAssist
ventures.stage: MVP Development — dev team in Argentina (Brantley). Expected completion: 3-4 months.
ventures.ninety_day_goal: Continue MVP development on schedule. Build GTM foundation so when MVP is ready, there's immediate market traction.
ventures.current_priority: 2. Begin market research and competitive intelligence

ventures.name: EpicLife
ventures.stage: MVP Development — dev team in India (Oodles).
ventures.ninety_day_goal: Continue MVP development. Define the GTM strategy. Explore the OpenClaw convergence opportunity.
ventures.current_priority: 2. Refine the product vision: onboarding flow, habit engine, vision→plan→daily execution framework

ventures.name: Black Knight Aura
ventures.stage: Early Development — being built by Oodles (India) alongside My Epic Life.
ventures.ninety_day_goal: Continue development. Define the curriculum/toolkit structure. Begin building the AI knowledge base that powers the coaching engine.
ventures.current_priority: 2. Define the core curriculum: What does the AI coach teach first?

ventures.name: FrontDesk
ventures.stage: Near Launch — app nearing completion, going to market in coming weeks.
ventures.ninety_day_goal: Launch the product. Onboard first paying customers. Establish product-market fit.
ventures.current_priority: 2. Complete QA and testing of call flows

ventures.name: STOIC
ventures.stage: Operational — seeking growth opportunities. Sells via Shopify, eBay, and Chrono24.
ventures.ninety_day_goal: Automate operations so STOIC runs with <15 min/day of Jason's time. Maintain/grow sales presence.
ventures.current_priority: 2. Ensure Shopify store is updated and optimized

ventures.name: Cyber Connector
ventures.stage: Concept — idea is framed up, needs a plan built out.
ventures.ninety_day_goal: Build the business plan, competitive analysis, and initial taxonomy. Determine go/no-go.

ventures.name: BKAG
ventures.stage: Early Formation — founding council established, structure defined, platform being set up on Circle.so.
ventures.ninety_day_goal: Finalize the platform on Circle.so. Recruit initial founding council members. Host first quarterly event.

ventures.name: Network Group
ventures.stage: Concept — general idea formed, not yet a formal entity. Lower priority.
ventures.ninety_day_goal: Define the concept clearly enough to decide: launch separately, merge with BKAG, or table for later.
